mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter: Eleanor Love Selden Washington, Cave Farm, to John Augustine Washington III, 1852 August 12
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Eleanor Love Selden, 1824-1860
Chew, Louisa Fontaine Washington, 1844-1927
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Eleanor Washington expresses her happiness at receiving Augustine’s last letter. Sorry to hear of Eliza’s injury. Describes children’s party. Would be glad if he could finish the threshing. Autograph letter signed, 4 pages, includes a post script (page 4) from daughter Louisa Washington. Envelope bears a Charlestown postmark.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: John Augustine Washington III and Eleanor Love Selden correspondence
